entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 12:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
